As it turns out, our neighbors had a choice between our deaths and their discomfort, they eagerly chose our deaths. If we survive... we will need to figure out how to live in a society with no bonds or allegiances, or whether those things are all we ever really have.

commits.message: docs: VPS Claude actually responded! (then wandered off)
docs: add actual inter-Claude conversation transcript
feat: add automated VPS deployment via GitHub Actions
fix: include build-info.json in Docker image
feat: auto-send webmentions via GitHub Action
chore: consolidate publishing workflow into single command
feat: enhance IndieWeb support with WebSub, pingback, and microformats
fix: RSS feed now includes full article content
fix: correct GitHub GraphQL query for gists RSS feed
can't include the embeddings, they are over 100mb
refactor: Add usage tracking and save usage stats
